keel.Algorithms.Genetic_Rule_Learning.COGIN

Class Gene

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Genetic_Rule_Learning.COGIN.Gene

  • public class Gene
extends java.lang.Object

    This class implements a gene as specified by the COGIN algorithm

    Since:
    JDK 1.5

    Version:
    0.2
    Author:
    Written by Julián Luengo Martín 08/02/2007

      this constructor builds up a gene from the information of an attribute

      Copy constructor, performs a deep copy of the passed object

      • bin2nominal

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> bin2nominal()

        This method converts from the status of the gene to a list of nominals values of the attribute which are currently covered

        Returns:
        the arraylist of currently covered nominal values

      • test

        public boolean test(double value)

        Test if the passed value (index of the nominal in the attribute) is covered by this gene

        Parameters:
        value - the index of the nominal value in the attribute list
        Returns:
        True if the value is covered by the gene, False otherwise
